lines.text: You gotta clear out of here fast! There's a posse coming to take you in for the Northfield job.
The Northfield job? I didn't know about it until I got this paper. Won't they let a man be honest?
Not if the man is Jesse James.
A couple of strangers wanting information about the roads. I told them to water their horses and come in to talk to you.
Do you think I should change, too?
We've got to keep moving. The law has a long reach.
What's the reason for all this violence and terrorism?
Well, honey, if we had the answers to those questions, we wouldn't have to be cleaning these firearms now.

[In Chapter 5]
Are you one of the men who killed me?
